Accept About Casino Rooms Contact This Is The Best Hotel About Us Superior Hotel In World Get Started ABOUT US Since 8+ Years HDHotel has been delivering exceptional hospitality for over 8 years. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in every aspect of your stay, from our luxurious accommodations to our attentive service. Experience the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and luxury that only HDHotel can offer. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, your satisfaction is our priority. Luxurious Accommodations Experience unparalleled comfort and elegance in our spacious, exquisitely designed rooms and suites. Each accommodation is meticulously appointed with modern amenities, premium bedding, and stylish decor to ensure a relaxing and enjoyable stay. From plush king-size beds to private balconies with stunning city views, every detail is crafted to provide a superior level of comfort. Gourmet Dining Savor the finest cuisine at HDHotel's gourmet restaurants. Our culinary team, comprised of world-renowned chefs, uses the freshest ingredients to create a diverse menu of international and local delicacies. Whether you prefer a fine dining experience or a casual meal, our dining options cater to every palate and occasion, promising a memorable gastronomic journey. Spa and Wellness Indulge in ultimate relaxation at our luxurious spa. Offering a comprehensive range of treatments, including massages, facials, and body therapies, our spa is designed to rejuvenate and revitalize. Complement your experience with access to our state-of-the-art wellness facilities, which include a fully equipped fitness center, sauna, and steam room. Event and Conference Facilities Host your next event in style at HDHotel. Our state-of-the-art conference and event spaces are perfect for business meetings, corporate events, and social gatherings. With advanced audiovisual equipment, customizable setups, and professional event planning services, we ensure your event is executed flawlessly, leaving a lasting impression on your guests. Prime Location Enjoy the convenience of our prime location in the heart of the city. HDHotel provides easy access to major attractions, shopping districts, cultural landmarks, and business hubs. Whether you are here for leisure or business, our central location allows you to explore the best the city has to offer with ease and convenience. Exceptional Service At HDHotel, we pride ourselves on providing exceptional service to all our guests. Our dedicated team is committed to meeting your every need, offering personalized assistance, 24/7 concierge services, and attentive hospitality. From the moment you arrive until your departure, we strive to ensure your stay is nothing short of extraordinary. BEST PRICES Extra Services Our dedicated concierge team is available around the clock to assist with anything you need, from restaurant reservations and ticket bookings to local recommendations and personalized itineraries. Keep your wardrobe fresh and immaculate with our prompt laundry and dry cleaning services. Our rooms and suites at HDHotel are designed to provide a luxurious and comfortable stay. Each room is equipped with high-speed internet access, flat-screen TVs with cable channels, minibar, coffee/tea making facilities, in-room safe, and a spacious work desk. The suites offer additional amenities such as separate living and dining areas, kitchenettes, and stunning views of the city or surrounding landscapes. Is there a restaurant onsite? Yes, HDHotel features an elegant onsite restaurant that serves a wide range of dishes throughout the day. Our menu includes both local and international cuisine, prepared by our skilled chefs using fresh, seasonal ingredients. The restaurant also offers a cozy bar area where guests can enjoy a selection of wines, cocktails, and beverages. Do you offer airport transportation services? To ensure a seamless travel experience, HDHotel provides airport shuttle services for our guests. You can arrange airport transfers with our concierge team upon booking or during your stay. Our friendly drivers will greet you at the airport and ensure you arrive at the hotel comfortably and safely. Are there meeting and event facilities at HDHotel? HDHotel offers a variety of leisure facilities to enhance your stay. Guests can enjoy our outdoor swimming pool, perfect for relaxing and soaking up the sun. Our spa center provides a range of treatments and massages to rejuvenate your body and mind. Additionally, our fitness center is equipped with modern gym equipment, allowing guests to maintain their workout routine while away from home. Does Diamond Hotel offer meeting and event spaces? Yes, HDHotel offers comprehensive meeting and event facilities suitable for various occasions. Our hotel features state-of-the-art conference rooms and event spaces that can accommodate small meetings, large conferences, weddings, and other social gatherings. Our experienced event planning team is available to assist with organizing and executing your event, ensuring it is successful and memorable. Got questions? We've got answers What amenities are included in the rooms and suites? Our rooms and suites are equipped with high-speed internet, flat-screen TVs, minibar, coffee/tea making facilities, in-room safe, and spacious bathrooms with premium toiletries. Is there a restaurant onsite? Yes, we have an elegant restaurant offering a variety of local and international dishes, as well as a bar serving a selection of beverages. Do you offer airport transportation services? We provide airport transfer services upon request to ensure a hassle-free journey. Are there meeting and event facilities? Yes, we have state-of-the-art conference rooms and event spaces suitable for various events. pages.policy: Privacy Policy at HDHotel: Safeguarding Your Personal Information and Ensuring Your Privacy is Protected. Learn How We Collect, Use, and Secure Your Data. x We utilize cookies to optimize your browsing experience. By continuing to navigate this site, you agree to our use of cookies for this purpose. Accept About Casino Rooms Contact This Is The Best Hotel Privacy Policy Superior Hotel In World Get Started Privacy Policy HDHotel Introduction HDHotel is committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users. This Privacy Policy describes the types of personal information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to protect it. By using our website, mobile applications, or any other HDHotel services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Personal Information We Collect We collect personal information from our users in a variety of ways, including: When you register for an account: We collect your name, email address, and password. When you book a hotel: We collect your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. How We Use Your Personal Information We use your personal information to provide and improve our services, including: To create and manage your account: We use your name, email address, and password to create and manage your HDHotel account. To process your hotel bookings: We use your name, email address, phone number, and payment information to process your hotel bookings. To provide customer support: We use your contact information to provide customer support and respond to your inquiries. To improve our website and mobile applications: We use information about your browsing history and search history to improve the user experience of our website and mobile applications. Sharing Your Personal Information We share your personal information with third parties only in the following circumstances: With service providers: We share your personal information with third-party service providers who help us provide our services, such as payment processors, email marketing providers, and customer support providers. With law enforcement: We may share your personal information with law enforcement agencies if we believe that it is necessary to comply with the law or to protect our users from harm. In the event of a sale or merger: We may share your personal information with a third party in the event of a sale or merger of HDHotel. Protecting Your Personal Information We take a number of steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure, including: Encryption: We encrypt your personal information in transit and at rest. Secure servers: We store your personal information on secure servers. Your Privacy Rights You have the following privacy rights: The right to access your personal information: You have the right to request a copy of the personal information that we hold about you. The right to rectify your personal information: You have the right to request that we correct any inaccurate or incomplete personal information that we hold about you. The right to erase your personal information: You have the right to request that we erase your personal information from our systems. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes to this Privacy Policy on our website and notify you by email. Contact Us If you have any questions, comments, or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at HDHotel@gmail.com (800) 33-175-84-01 HDHotel@gmail.com Adarsha Palace Hotel & Community Centre About Casino Rooms Contact Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Disclaimer Copyright © 2024. All Rights Reserved

Accept About Casino Rooms Contact This Is The Best Hotel Terms & Conditions Superior Hotel In World Get Started Terms & Conditions Welcome to HDHotel, the premier destination for all your hotel booking needs. Our platform connects you with a vast network of hotels and resorts worldwide, offering you an unparalleled selection of accommodations at exclusive rates. These Terms and Conditions ('Terms') govern your use of our website, mobile application, and other related services (collectively, the 'Services'). By accessing or using the Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Services. 1. Definitions 'HDHotel,' 'we,' 'us,' and 'our' refer to HDHotel Inc., a company incorporated under the laws of Bangladesh. 'You' refers to the individual or entity using the Services. 'Account' refers to your registered account with HDHotel. 'Booking' refers to the reservation or purchase of a hotel room or other accommodation made through the Services. 'Content' refers to all text, graphics, images, videos, audio, and other materials available on or through the Services. 'Services' refer to the website, mobile application, and other related services provided by HDHotel. 2. Eligibility You must be at least 18 years of age and possess the legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement to use the Services. You may not use the Services if you are prohibited from doing so under applicable law. 3. Account Creation To access certain features of the Services, you may need to create an Account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your Account and all activities that occur under your Account. You agree to provide accurate and truthful information when creating your Account. 4. Booking Process Availability: The availability of hotel rooms and other accommodations displayed on the Services is subject to change without notice. HDHotel does not guarantee the availability of any particular hotel room or accommodation. Room Types and Amenities: Descriptions of hotel rooms and accommodations on the Services are based on information provided by our partners. HDHotel is not responsible for the accuracy or completeness of this information. You should carefully review the room descriptions and amenities before making a Booking. Confirmation: Upon successful payment, you will receive a confirmation email or mobile notification containing the details of your Booking. 5. Cancellation and Refunds Cancellation Policy: Each hotel or accommodation provider has its own cancellation policy. You can view the cancellation policy for a specific hotel or accommodation during the Booking process. Refund: In the event of a cancellation, the refund amount will be determined in accordance with the cancellation policy of the hotel or accommodation provider. 6. User Content User Contributions: You may contribute Content to the Services, such as reviews, photos, and comments. By contributing Content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to publish, reproduce, modify, distribute, and otherwise use your Content in connection with the Services. Content Standards: You are responsible for all Content you contribute to the Services. Your Content must not be: Illegal, fraudulent, or defamatory. 7. Intellectual Property The Services and all Content are the exclusive property of HDHotel or its licensors. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works based on the Services or any Content without our express written permission. 8. Limitation of Liability HDHotel shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, including but not limited to lost profits or business interruption, arising from your use of the Services. Our total liability to you for any claim under these Terms shall not exceed the amount you paid for the Booking that gave rise to the claim. 9. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless HDHotel, its directors, officers, employees, and agents against any and all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising from your use of the Services or your breach of these Terms. pages.thanks: Thank You for Choosing HDHotel: Your Premier Destination for Luxury and Comfort. Thank You for Choosing HDHotel At HDHotel, we believe that travel should be an enriching experience, filled with comfort, convenience, and lasting memories. We strive to create a seamless and enjoyable journey for our guests, from the moment they book their stay to the moment they check out. We are genuinely grateful for your choice of HDHotel as your preferred accommodation. We work tirelessly to provide a high-quality experience, and your positive feedback fuels our passion to continue exceeding expectations. We offer a range of comfortable and beautifully designed rooms, each thoughtfully equipped with modern amenities to ensure a relaxing and enjoyable stay. Sink into luxurious bedding with plush pillows and high-thread-count linens for a restful night's sleep. Our rooms are designed for both comfort and functionality, providing ample space for you to unwind, relax, and recharge. Wake up to breathtaking vistas of the city skyline, serene gardens, or picturesque landscapes, depending on your choice of room. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, anticipating your needs and catering to your every request. Our reception is available around the clock to assist you with any inquiries or needs you may have throughout your stay. We understand that every guest is unique, and we tailor our service to meet your individual requirements. We offer multilingual support to ensure smooth communication and a comfortable experience for guests from around the world. Keep your fitness routine on track with our fully equipped gym, featuring a range of cardio machines and weight training equipment. Relax and unwind in our sparkling pool, perfect for a refreshing dip or leisurely swim. Enjoy a variety of culinary experiences at our on-site restaurants and bars, offering exquisite dishes and refreshing beverages. ur well-equipped business center provides a convenient space for meetings, presentations, and work. Stay connected and productive with our complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel. We are strategically located in the heart of the city, offering easy access to major attractions, shopping districts, and entertainment options. Our dedicated concierge team is happy to assist with booking tours, arranging transportation, and providing local recommendations. We offer exclusive partnerships with local businesses and attractions, ensuring you can experience the best the city has to offer. We are committed to environmental sustainability and implement eco-friendly practices throughout our operations. We value your feedback and strive to continuously improve our offerings based on your suggestions. Please share your thoughts and experiences with us through our website, guest surveys, or directly with our staff. Thank you again for choosing HDHotel. We look forward to welcoming you back for another unforgettable stay! Home
